ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.interfaces
Interface Texture

All Known Implementing Classes:
GLTexture
public interface Texture

Declares the functionality to manage textures in OpenGL.

Method Summary
 void createTexture(int resource)
          Creates the texture.
 int getID()
          Gets the ID that is associated with this texture.
 void load()
          Loads the image from the Android resources and passes it to OpenGL as a texture.
 

Method Detail

createTexture

void createTexture(int resource)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Creates the texture. Android manages resources with an integer id. This method is used to create a reference to the resource with the correct image.

Parameters:
resource - the resource that references the image for the texture
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

load

void load()
Loads the image from the Android resources and passes it to OpenGL as a texture. Creates an id for the texture that will be used for further reference of the texture.

getID

int getID()
Gets the ID that is associated with this texture.

Returns:
the ID
